# selectedTabViewItem

**Instance Property**

The tab view item for the currently selected tab.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var selectedTabViewItem: NSTabViewItem? { get }
```

## Discussion

If no item is selected, the value of this property is `nil`.

## Selecting a Tab

- **selectFirstTabViewItem(_:)**: This action method selects the first tab view item.
- **selectLastTabViewItem(_:)**: This action method selects the last tab view item.
- **selectNextTabViewItem(_:)**: This action method selects the next tab view item in the sequence.
- **selectPreviousTabViewItem(_:)**: This action method selects the previous tab view item in the sequence.
- **selectTabViewItem(_:)**: Selects the specified tab view item.
- **selectTabViewItem(at:)**: Selects the tab view item specified by `index`.
- **selectTabViewItem(withIdentifier:)**: Selects the tab view item specified by `identifier`.
- **takeSelectedTabViewItemFromSender(_:)**: Sets the selected tab view item to the selected item obtained from the sender.
